titleStmt.title: A new dialogue vvherin is conteyned the examinatio[n] of the messe and of that kynde of priesthode, whych is ordeined to saye messe: and to offer vp for remyssyon of synne, the body and bloud of Christe agayne.
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
